root.message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 17-5-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: UNCTAD is the focal point for international investment issues within the United Nations system. Through this survey, UNCTAD seeks to collect data relevant to measure indicator 17.5.1 specifically, which refers to the efforts made by member States of the United Nations to promote outward investment to developing countries, including least developed countries (LDCs).
